name: 0_G
description:
0_G, a one button physics platformer.

0_G is a game about a engineer being sent into the vast expanse of space to repair space stations. You have to navigate through decrepit ruins and asteroid belts to reach your goals. Try to get accustomed to a life of zero gravity with a one button movement system that is easy to learn but difficult to master.   

How to play

Left mouse button to move

M for menu

R to restart
